::Hot Rod::

Seeing that most of the Alliance force was still around, Hot Rod falls
back to the CF.
"We're going to need alot more help."

::DrillBit::

Goldeneye still hadn't come.
"We should probably go, Killfest."

::Demolition::

Although his head was a chared shell, internal repairs was able to get
the systems working. He came out of stasis lock.
"Oh my head."
He notices he is in a brig.
"The Maximal's! I've been captured!"
He opens a link, hoping to get through.
"All Alliance members, this is Demolition. I've been put in the
Cybertronian Fire's brig. I need help."

::Dollen::

Dollen was still in StarScreams cockpit during the dog fight.
"I dont know whats worse. This flying, or looking at Megaton's ugly
mug!"
